lines.text: [Cat is forced through a conveyor machine which petrifies him into the classic "Thinker" statue]
No. Not the works. Don't do it! In the name of humanity! NOT THE WORKS!
The rain pipe! No, no, don't do it! Not the rain pipe! Not the RAIN PIPE!
No, not the fence! No, not that again! Please, no, don't! NOOOT THE FEEEENNNCE!

[desperately, while the dog is trying to thread the cat's fence through a knothole in the fence]
Now let's talk this over, there must be some other way. Let's be grown ups let's talk it over, man to man. Let's not be hasty.

[threads the tail, goes around the fence and yanks the cat through]
OOOOOOOH, I HATE THAT!
